entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
